root: ^I'm glad that you could join me.
^I just want to spend some time with you. How are you doing?
^So I'm curious, what made you question your house's innocence?
^No, not at all. Just a conversation. You can ask me questions, too.
^Very well. But I must correct you.
^I did not question my house's innocent.
^Indeed. I did not come to you because I mistrusted my house. I came to you because it would have served no benefit to allow my own bias to be the only thing I consider.
^If I am to fight for my house, I must be certain that they are innocent of any accusations.
^Naturally. Well I am glad to have met you. Tell me, why did you decide to become a soldier in the first place?

^That was not by my own choice. If I had had my way, I would have been a historical writer. However, my analysis of our house history was somewhat negative, and I received heavy criticism for it. In order to devote myself to our house's honor, I was ordered to join the army.
^Do not worry. Whatever I must do, I will do it. If this is what I need to do right now, then I will not object.
^Even though you want to be doing something else?
^Yes. I cannot choose what happens in my life, I can only choose to take on my happenings with dignity.
^I respect that, but make sure to take care of yourself, too.
^Of course. Now I will ask you a question.

YES: ^I have improved greatly since I began as a detective.
^So yes, I would say I'm content with the work I'm doing now.
^Do you still have room to grow.
^Everyone does. But if my work doesn't improve from here, I am content.
ISTILLHAVEROOMTOGROW: ^Honestly, I still have room for substantial growth.
^When I started, I wasn't great, but I kept working, and I got better. But where I am now, it's not all that I am capable of. There are still many ways that I can help the world.
^While I can safely say I am proud of my work, I will not lie and say that I don't often disappoint myself.
^I see. We can all always improve. If you have no more room to grow, then what is the point of living?
^I don't know if I have an answer to that.
